channel.title: Octave - Tribute (Need some ideas)
channel.description:
So I’m not looking for a collab but I’m struggling for ideas. I’ve got the main ‘chorus’ nailed but I’m having issues thinking up a good idea for an ‘intro’ or a ‘verse’. This track is called tribute as it’s heavily inspired by my favourite artist Avicii who passed away last year. If you are wanting to help, try and keep it within this style as much as possible. Thanks!
https://app.auxy.co/projects/gQizxsVphwxccI6vqnJBZg==

item.title: Octave - Tribute (Need some ideas)
item.dc:creator: EVERANGE
item.description:
No prob, I knew it didn’t fit that well, but I just decided to go with either because it’s one of my favorite sounds, lol

Read full topic

item.title: Octave - Tribute (Need some ideas)
item.dc:creator: Octave
item.description:
I like the structure of the intro, not too keen on the saw but I’ll probably change it to a different lead. Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Octave - Tribute (Need some ideas)
item.dc:creator: EVERANGE
item.description:
Thanks, but it’s really all @Octave’s music, I just reordered some of it, lol

Read full topic

item.title: Octave - Tribute (Need some ideas)
item.dc:creator: EVERANGE
item.description:
Also, that is a lovely and catchy melody you got there. Also I didn’t know Avicii passed away, I need to keep up with the artist world. That’s very sad, he was one of my favorite producers and I still remember some his catchy songs such as Friend of Mine.

Read full topic

item.title: Octave - Tribute (Need some ideas)
item.dc:creator: EVERANGE
item.description:
I didn’t change much, I just used the loops you made to make an intro and I added the crunchy saw to the chorus just because I have an obsession with crunchy saw. You don’t have to use it there if you don’t want, it’s up to you. Good luck!

https://app.auxy.co/projects/e4oI3nfNnhmJMlYIwFDg7g==

Read full topic
